description: Yeehaa is a tech-savvy manager and consultant with extensive experience in software engineering and project management. Their expertise spans multiple industries, driving innovation and efficiency. Yeehaa's work focuses on ecosystem architecture, innovation practices, and sustainable design. They've authored insightful blog posts on biological ecosystems and regenerative innovation, and curated courses on ecosystem grooming and innovative practices. Their approach combines academic knowledge with practical skills to foster resilient, interconnected organizational structures.
blurb: Yeehaa: A seasoned tech manager and consultant driving innovation through ecosystem architecture and sustainable design. Combines academic insights with practical expertise to foster resilient, interconnected organizational structures.
